#summary Additional notes about sitemaps.

===About sitemaps===
[http://www.sitemaps.org/ Sitemaps.org]

===Robots.txt===
Add to your robots.txt following directive:

*`Sitemap: http://www.example.com/sitemap.xml`*

[http://www.sitemaps.org/protocol.php#informing Details]

===PHP Timezone===
You may need to setup your timezone if it's not set correctly in
PHP config or datetime values for _'lastmod'_ attributes.
[http://php.net/manual/en/datetime.formats.php More about datetime formats].
All datetime values will be converted to [http://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime W3C datetime format].
